title: The Blood of Cowards
description: The vampire, Lazarus Kalon, is on his way back to Atlanta to liberate his treasure before the city falls to Sherman's army. Sick from a prolonged thirst, Lazarus, encounters three rebel deserters in the Appalachians. The vampire anti-hero closes in on the deserters, intending only to feed his thirst. Yet, Lazarus is soon overcome by a supernatural awareness that one of these soldiers may be worthy of the immortal gift.The Blood of Cowards is a dark supernatural fantasy set during the American Civil War. Gothic horror fans will rejoice with this vampire series of short stories. Now look inside.
author: Matt  Cole
